column4: hey guys I am using my buddies laptop, he got a virus on windows and he cant delete this certian file. I am using the ubuntu live cd, it looks like the partition where the fie is is mounted on hda5, but it isnt writeable, what is the command to make it writeable drive?
if it's ntfs, you can't
unless you install captive-ntfs
is that strictly for the live version?
no, it's a general linux thing
apt-get works on the live cd, yes
is the actual package called captive-ntfs?
no
what is the command to install captive-ntfs
there are lots of them
did you configure the network yet?
you can ping google.com?
yes I can ping www.google.com
what difference does it make if i can ping www.google.com?
that means your network at least somewhat works
could do
sudo apt-setup
what should i type into the ftp mirror in apt-setup? I can only find http ones
you can't use http?
i dunno... what else could this message mean? E: Method http has died unexpectedly!
perhaps that the cd is broken, or the network connection or the apt config or ...
